General.Name: GFM Services Bhd
General.Description: GFM Services Berhad, an investment holding company, provides integrated facilities management and consultancy services to public and private sectors primarily in Malaysia. It operates through Facilities Management, Concession Arrangements, and Others segments. The Facilities Management segment provides facilities operations, maintenance and management, engineering services, consultancy, and advisory services. Its Concession Arrangements segment constructs and maintains facilities and infrastructure. The Others segment offers investment holding, fund raising, rendering group management, and administrative services. In addition, it provides facility operation and maintenance, which includes civil, structural and architectural; electrical distribution/back-up power/generators; heating ventilation air-conditioning, and fire detection and fighting systems, as well as water reticulation, and plumbing and sewerage system. The company also offers CMMS/building control, event facilitation, helpdesk, and IT systems; workers camp management; safety and health, compliance management, and sustainability programs; custodial, security, and waste management; and biomedical engineering management. Further, it's facilities consultancy and advisory includes business case analysis, facility condition audit, facility planning and design review, life cycle cost analysis, facility optimization, transition management, energy audit and accreditation, asset refurbishment program, development service level agreement and key performance indicator, and integrated management system, as well as compliant work process development. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
